mapper.sql: id, user_id, company_id, target_mail, entry_employee_name, entry_position, report_date, report_location, reception_personnel, contact_number, created_id, last_modify_id, created_time, last_modify_time, version_num, deleted, is_valid
mapper.insert: insert into entry_notice (user_id, company_id, target_mail, entry_employee_name, entry_position, report_date, report_location, reception_personnel, contact_number, created_id, last_modify_id, created_time, last_modify_time, version_num, deleted, is_valid) values (#{userId}, #{companyId}, #{targetMail}, #{entryEmployeeName}, #{entryPosition}, #{reportDate}, #{reportLocation}, #{receptionPersonnel}, #{contactNumber}, #{createdId}, #{lastModifyId}, #{createdTime}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{versionNum}, #{deleted}, #{isValid})

mapper.update:
update entry_notice
user_id = #{userId},
company_id = #{companyId},
target_mail = #{targetMail},
entry_employee_name = #{entryEmployeeName},
entry_position = #{entryPosition},
report_date = #{reportDate},
report_location = #{reportLocation},
reception_personnel = #{receptionPersonnel},
contact_number = #{contactNumber},
created_id = #{createdId},
last_modify_id = #{lastModifyId},
created_time = #{createdTime},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime},
version_num = #{versionNum},
deleted = #{deleted},
is_valid = #{isValid},
where id = #{id}

update entry_notice set user_id = #{userId}, company_id = #{companyId}, target_mail = #{targetMail}, entry_employee_name = #{entryEmployeeName}, entry_position = #{entryPosition}, report_date = #{reportDate}, report_location = #{reportLocation}, reception_personnel = #{receptionPersonnel}, contact_number = #{contactNumber}, created_id = #{createdId}, last_modify_id = #{lastModifyId}, created_time = #{createdTime}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime}, version_num = #{versionNum}, deleted = #{deleted}, is_valid = #{isValid} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select to_char( created_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) as createdTime, entry_employee_name as entryEmployeeName, entry_position as entryPosition, id as id from entry_notice where user_id = #{userId} and company_id = #{companyId}
